Items: The sister is offended at you. Apparently, we shouldn't expect her visits anymore.
According to Longerpod, the first meeting could have been more productive. All responsibility for the announcement of the curfew fell on the shoulders of the colonel. (+ 5 Emperor's reputation)
The mayor's office forked out a lump sum. The mayor lived up to Longerpod's expectations. (+ 30 reputation with the Emperor)
Longerpod had to hire two volunteers. The colonel is displeased. (- 10 reputation with the Emperor, - 2 volunteers)
Mr. Jameson is disappointed. He will not appear in the city hall again. He was never seen again in the city.
Jacob Jameson is insulted to the core. He is disappointed in the mayor.
